title: Ramadan 2026 timings for Dubai Global Village announced: Majlis, live shows, full line-up of events for Season 30
summary_full: Global Village announces its operating hours and Ramadan program, featuring cultural evenings, diverse food, and togetherness. The destination will be adorned with traditional decor and a new majlis-inspired seating area, Multaqa, will encourage social gatherings. Visitors can enjoy live music, cultural performances, and a wide array of dining and shopping options throughout the Holy Month.
